header.title: One Punch Man
header.description: Saitama is a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, but he struggles with the mundanity of his everyday life.

list.title: Wagnaria!!
list.description: Sota Takanashi starts working at a family restaurant and meets a group of eccentric coworkers.

list.title: Nichijou
list.description: A group of high school students navigate the absurdities of everyday life.

list.title: KonaSuba
list.description: Kazuma Sato is reincarnated in a fantasy world and forms a party with a goddess, a mage, and a crusader.

list.title: FLCL
list.description: The craziest six episodes of your life.
